channel.title: C++ on bg

item.title: TSP subtour elimination II - User Cut Callbacks
item.description: In an earlier post I demoed the lazy constraint callback of ORTools’ math_opt module to generate subtour elimination constraints for the TSP. Coded in Python the process to solve a single instance took around 65 seconds. I wondered what the runtime of the same algorithm and instance would be if instead of python, we’d use the C++ ORTools library. In the next few paragraphs we will reduce the runtime from 65 to 12 seconds by using
